General.Name: Sinoseal Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinoseal Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of mechanical seals and their auxiliary systems in China and internationally. It offers dry gas seals for compressors, rotary jet pumps, mechanical seals for pumps, support systems for pumps, nuclear power products, spare parts, and rotary jet pumps, as well as seal intelligent monitoring system. The company serves petrochemical, coal chemical, oil and gas transmission, nuclear power, fine chemical, and other fields. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No.8, Wuke West 4 Road, Chengdu, China, 610045
